availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry J. Lyons (Jefferson County, Kentucky, bank officer.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bank officer. Washington, D. C. native. Married to Laura Lyons. Father of Willie L. Lyons. Bank exchange officer in Louisville in 1860. Employed Mary Murphy as a domestic worker in 1860. Served as assistant quartermaster general of Kentucky in June 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 98.
Find A Grave, "Henry J. Lyons (January 7, 1828 - April 11, 1867)," Memorial #9979064, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/9979064 (accessed May 24, 2017).
